title: OnlyFalse
description: Dive into the Rat Trap Bar, where the smell of rotten vegetables mixes with the sweet stench of lies, and challenge your friends to the most thrilling card game of your lives!
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Only False is a bluffing game set in a world where unreliable and mischievous veggies come to life.
<!--text-->
Bucket List Before You Die:

Join the ranks of regulars at the Rat Trap Bar. (Check)

Dive into a bluffing game where you and your friends can laugh to death(!). (Check)

Outsmart your rivals one by one and make your mark in the stew that's brewing! (Failed Attempt)

Only False is a bluffing game set in a world where unreliable and mischievous veggies come to life. Outsmart your opponents with clever bluffs and prove to everyone that you're the ultimate master of manipulation!

<!--image-->
![OnlyFalse-mh59h](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/ab23977b02d44c74939f2f161d4799a0/onlyfalse-mh59h.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
The goal of the game: Get rid of all your cards (before someone meets their untimely end).

Once the table card is set, players take turns placing their cards face down, bluffing as they go.

If you suspect a player of bluffing, you can call them out and make them reveal their cards.

Caught them lying? They have to pull one of the six trap triggers on the table.

But beware! Wrongly accuse someone, and it’s your turn to pull the trigger.

After every trigger pull, the table deck resets, and a new round begins.

<!--image-->
![OnlyFalse-tmt5o](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/ab23977b02d44c74939f2f161d4799a0/onlyfalse-tmt5o.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Lennie: Forget everything you think you know! To outplay Lennie, you’ll need to get inside his head.


Mrs. Pearl: Graceful, charming, and as sweet as honey. Sitting at the same table with her should be an honor—until she starts bluffing!


Slick Rick: Don’t ask him about his shady past, especially how he got his nickname… Slick Rick is a slippery master of deception.

Hank the Mush: If you run into this rogue mushroom in dark and damp corners, hold your breath and change your path.

<!--image-->
![OnlyFalse-1e6u8](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/ab23977b02d44c74939f2f161d4799a0/onlyfalse-1e6u8.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
With the power of Early Access, we’re committed to rolling out regular updates, including new characters, game modes, and leaderboards.

<!--image-->
![OnlyFalse-1dwxc](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/ab23977b02d44c74939f2f161d4799a0/onlyfalse-1dwxc.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Caught cheating? We feel bad about it too, which is why Only False is protected by the EAC anti-cheat system to keep things fair and fun.
